main.gol.model.boards

Class FixedBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.gol.model.boards.FixedBoard
  • Deprecated.

    public class FixedBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the class that was used for the old game board with fixed size.
    See Also:
    DynamicBoard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedBoard(int columns, int rows)
      Deprecated. 
      This constructor constructs a new FixedBoard with the given number of rows and columns

        public void setBoard(byte[][] board)
        Deprecated.

      • nextGeneration

        public void nextGeneration()
        Deprecated. 
        This method populates the next generation of cells in a generation list. Checks each cell for its state, then checks each neighbors state and counts surrounding live cells. Collects the next generation of cells in a ArrayList of Cell objects.

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard(Cell[][] grid)
        Deprecated. 
        This method iterates through the drawCell drawGrid and sets all living cells to dead/false
        Parameters:
        grid - cell[][]

      • randomize
